column3: A violent act of terrorism is highly unlikely. Measures are in place to keep the population safe.
A violent act of terrorism is possible but unlikely. Measures are in place to keep the population safe.
A violent act of terrorism could occur. Additional measures are in place to keep the population safe.
A violent act of terrorism is likely. Heightened measures are in place to keep the population safe.
A violent act of terrorism is highly likely and could occur imminently. Exceptional measures are in place to keep the population safe.
